CustomField.description:
this field is being updated from the approval process, this field contains the following values: 'Delivery', 'Project Management, this is being used at the backend based on which different values are shown in the "Stage" field and based on the approval requester role (Vendor PO Approval), the field value will be updated. e.g; if the requester is from Delivery role(e.g; Service Delivery Executive, SDM, ADM, etc.), the value will be updated as Delivery and if the requester is from Project Management role(e.g; Sr. Project Executive, Project Manager, etc.).
Remarks:- This field is not used in page layout.
CustomField.label: Approval Stage Controller
